And as we all well know, being Facebook Friends just plain makes it official! If you’re not familiar with their work, Barats and Bereta make some hilarious video sketches, and you should certainly hop on over to their website and check out their stuff. Start out with a good look at “Mothers Day,” “PC Frat Boys, and perhaps “Completely Uncalled For.”

Thanks to Dave for introducing me to these guys!
